column1: Little Goat Diner////Service was good and friendly. ONE thing to note is that if you go to the bathrooms (whether it's guy or girl)
column2: be prepared to get jizzed on by their soap dispenser. I thought it was just me being clumsy and awkward
column3: but when I walked out of the bathroom
column4: the boy had a stain on his shirt from the bathroom soap as well. It's kind of funny. Not a cute "twinsies" moment.
